deployment.message:
{"type":"deployment","sha":"4c9e1bbd15dba3480732ab71de3b7d85abaf0582","repoName":"KaunteyShah/credit-risk-analysis-tool","actor":"KaunteyShah","slotName":"production","commitMessage":"feat: Add comprehensive company details modal with AI reasoning

- Add new API endpoint /api/company_details/<index> with AI reasoning
- Add AI Reasoning Agent using OpenAI API with fallback logic
- Add info buttons to company table for detailed modal view
- Update modal to show company info, business metrics, address, description
- Position UK SIC code prominently with Old Accuracy (removed New Accuracy)
- Enhanced AI reasoning explains why accuracy score is what it is
- Use only Sample_data2.csv data (removed updated_sic_predictions.csv refs)
- Add real API key integration via Azure Key Vault
- Add OpenAI dependency to requirements files
- Improve performance with timeout handling and fallback reasoning

Fixes modal loading performance and provides comprehensive company analysis"}
